result.execSummary:
The defendant Mindy A Wood was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Financial obligations on both counts are converted to a Civil Judgment
.

.

.

Concurrent with: Concurrent with Ct 1 of this case
.

records.addlTxt: Order for Judgment - $1582.09 in favor of R.O. by the def & 10% rest. srchge of $158.21 to DA's office- signed by RAG
Motion for Consolidation w/ cases 15CM1119, 15CM1272, 16CM774, 16CM876 & 15CM398 - Order signed by RAG

State by Donskey /  Def w/ Atty Joseph Geraldson
Geraldson:  would like to do sentencing today on 15CM1272...other cases State has made offer that def would like time to consider that offer - there's another case not on calendar today..it's an OWI
CRT:  we have a problem becuase GLD deferred to me the JSS Violations (15CM1119 & 16CM876)
Def:  had CRT that day @ 9am - that's why I missed those tests
CRT: when did def reinstate?
Donskey:  8-18
CRT:  Def has now reinstated her DL & is now eligible to drive
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed
CRT'S SENTENCE:  Def to serve 5 days CJ on each count Concurrent - def to be taken into custody immediately - Jail can determine if any sentence credit is due on the 5 days;  Pay CRT Costs totalling $443 - converted to a Civil Judgment;  Pay restitution to R.O. an amount of $1582.09 + 10% srchge to DA's office - converted to a Civil Judgment

N/A by Def
Geraldson - Her father fell and she needed to take care of him.
Court: At this point, I will need some verification there was a medical
emergency and I will have Cindy give you 10 days to try to figure something 
out for consolidation.

to Cindy C. from Attorney Joe Geraldson re: Def would like to move the Sentencing
date so she can go out of town to see her father and family - father is in ill health.
(Attached copy of letter that was sent to Judge Horne and Judge Doyle)
Sentencing hearing on July 28, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Jury Questions filed

Count 1 - Criminal Damage to Property - GUILTY
Count 2 - Bail Jumping - GUILTY
Jury Polled - Court accepts Verdicts and enters Convictions
Jury Excused
Court: Internal Review in 10 days - if not set for Sentencing by then,
Court will set for Sentencing.
Random Listing Report - Voir Dire

Def w/Atty Geraldson
13 jurors chosen
Jurors to report by 8:45am tomorrow to start at 9am

Def in court w/Atty Joseph Geraldson.  Susan Donskey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Donskey recites offer. 
Geraldson is ready for trial. 
Defendant rejects offer.  Def feels unprepared for trial. 
CT:  Offer is off table.  Case will proceed to trial.

9:30 am Defendant Mindy A Wood in court.  Susan Bakken-Donskey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Letter from Atty Geraldson.   No obj. to motion to impeach w/3 convictions if she testifies.
COURT grants motion to impeach with 3 convictions.
to Impeach

Final pre-trial at 04-18-2016 09:00 am.
Jury selection at 05-09-2016 08:45 am.
Jury trial at 05-10-2016 08:45 am.

From: ADA Vasupuram Re: ask for 1 day trial in 15CM1272 with other 2 cases to follow along
SLH: ok to remove - STC mid Feb

3:03 pm Def in court w/Atty Joseph Geraldson.  Brian Keith Barton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Geraldson just appointed.  Haven't gone over the facts of the case with Ms. Wood yet.
COURT will leave the court trial on for the 21st - 15CM-398).  We'll call the other cases at the same time for status.
Joseph Geraldson

Def by/Atty Kisken
Kisken: she was given notice of his hearing
CRT: SPD to appt successor counsel. Will grant the request to withdraw
Vasupuram: object to joining these cases at trial
CRT: we have it for 1/8 & indicate in NOH that she needs to appear or warrant
STC: 1/8 @ 3 - keep trial on for now

Def Atty Peter Kisken's Motion to Withdraw as Counsel

Court: This is something I need her to be here for.
